Package review

Class ReviewManager

java.lang.Object
review.ReviewManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReviewHandler
public class ReviewManager extends Object implements ReviewHandler
This class creates and manages a file to store film reviews. It handles adding new reviews, updating existing reviews, and calculating average review scores for films. Currently, a user can review a film several times, which is not optimal. An improvement would be to make sure a user could not review a film several times, but rather change their review.
Author:
Trudy Ann Roberts

  • Method Details

    • saveReview

      public void saveReview(String filmTitle, int newReview)
      Saves the film review to a file. If the film already has reviews, the new review will update the average score.
      Specified by:
      saveReview in interface ReviewHandler
      Parameters:
      filmTitle - The title of the film.
      newReview - The new rating provided by the user.

    • updateAverageReview

      public String updateAverageReview(String filmLine, int newReview)
      Updates the average review for a film by incorporating a new review. Calculates the new average rating and increments the review count.
      Specified by:
      updateAverageReview in interface ReviewHandler
      Parameters:
      filmLine - The line with the film's current review data.
      newReview - The new rating to incorporate.
      Returns:
      The updated line reflecting the new average score and review count.

    • loadAllReviews

      public List<String> loadAllReviews()
      Loads all reviews from the review file.
      Specified by:
      loadAllReviews in interface ReviewHandler
      Returns:
      a list of all stored film reviews, or an empty list if no reviews exist
